message: I'm feeling generous, Bob.  Let's split this 90/10.  We can both walk away happy.
I'm willing to give you a decent share, but I think I deserve more. This is my best offer.
I'm willing to compromise, Bob. Let's split it 60/40 this time.  This is a fair deal for both of us.
I'm not going to get taken advantage of. I'll give you a slightly better deal, but I'm not going to give you the majority.
Let's be reasonable, Bob. We both know the value of the money is declining. A 50/50 split is the fairest option. This way, we both get a decent share before the money is worth even less.
